jobDescription: Role: Datawarehouse Data AnalystLocation: Hamilton, NJDuration: 6-12 Months F2F Interview  Medicare or Medicaid working for some type of healthcare company. Strong health care background, 1-2 years Medicare or Medicaid, sql, debugging, data mapping, data warehouse data analyst experience.Project description: The Data Analyst will be part of the State of New Jersey Data Warehouse implementation team which is an enterprise data warehouse that contains information extracted from several state transactional systems, ranging from New Jersey Medicaid / Children's Health insurance Program (CHIP) to NJ Family Assistance Management Information System (FAMIS) all the way to diverse programs such as Heating Assistance. As part of the Replacement Medicaid Management Information System (RMMIS) project, the new Medicaid Warehouse will support Data Warehouse functions for the RMMIS and the also the migrated functions of the existing legacy repository. In addition custom reporting capabilities through Cognos Analytics and Advanced Analytics tools will round out the offering in statistics, healthcare analytics, Fraud and Abuse detection and Management and Reporting products.Thanks & Regards,  Joshua Daniel  Sr. IT Recruiter  Direct : 860- 730-2979  Joshua@Fusionss.com Fusion Software Solutions LLC8 Hanover Lane, South Windsor, CT, 06074-1374
